name: Hot Robot
description:
Silicone Skirmish!
Take out the enemy team with an assortment of sex toy firing weapons. Pick them off with the Butt-plug Sniper rifle, trip them up with the Anal Bead Bola-wrap Shooter, or slap them silly with a barrage of wiggly airborne dildos! All these weapons and more are in your arse-tickling arsenal. Use them to vibrate your way to victory.

P2P Multiplayer
Teams of up to four players face off in:

Team Deathmatch
Teams battle it out in a dildo-to-the-death free for all.

Capture the Flag
Capture the enemy "flag" to score!

Conquest
Stand your ground! Hold goal areas and fling dongs at whoever tries to blow up your spot.

Deathmatch
It's Every bot for themselves in this absolute dongslaught.

Offline Mode
Play Conquest or Deathmatch against AI enemy robots.

Full Disclosure!
Because Hot Robot is an indie operation with limited resources there are some caveats to our otherwise unquestionable awesomeness:
1: The four different modes of play are currently only played in one of two available maps.
2: Not a bunch of people know about this game yet, so matches may be scarce until people realize how much it kicks ass to hit people with dildos.
Oh, and until the first patch, Deathmatch bots and audio are gonna be a little jank and there'll just be a blank, boring screen while loading maps.
That said . . .
We absolutely look forward to developing new maps and weapons and will work hard to tighten up and give you the best sex toy shooting experience possible.
